title: Please Google team- fix camera noise I'm change iphone 12 pro to pixel 4xl For performance and camer
content:
Please Google team- fix camera noise
I'm change iphone 12 pro to pixel 4xl
For performance and camera
Now I regret. Because the camera is very noisy.
Please fix this problem. Or I have to change my
phone again
-
l ask you to create something strong with
Android 12, we are all waiting.
High quality by posting photos on Instagram
and with all social media apps. Higher quality
for storytelling on Instagram and SnapChat
Android is always the best, I am very satisfied
with Pixel. Only with version android 12
Improve the problem of battery life and improve
the camera . Success for Android. I appreciate
your work
